name: Wikipedia clean minimal
description: Removes everything except articles. Compacts the Table of Contents to top-right corner until mouse-hovered. wikipedia.org wikimedia.org wiktionary.org wikiquote.org wikibooks.org wikisource.org wikinews.org wikiversity.org wikimediafoundation.org mediawiki.org wikivoyage.org wiki.openstreetmap.org wikidata.org translatewiki.net
